description: BORIS is the institutional repository of the University of Bern and lists the scientific publications produced at the University of Bern.
name: Bern Open Repository and Information System

description: Search ETH Zurich’s Research Collection for scientific publications and research data or submit your own research output.
name: ETH Zurich’s Research Collection

description: Producción científica asociada a proyectos y becas financiados por ANID
name: Repositorio ANID

owner.name: Agencia National de Invegasticion y Desarollo

description: Ktisis is a Current Research Information System (CRIS) gathering any digital material relating to the various activities of the Cyprus University of Technology, especially original research material produced by the members of the University. Defined in this framework, Ktisis demonstrates the intellectual life and the research activities of the University, preserving, spreading and promoting the scientific research to the local and international community. Ktisis was named after the symbol of the Cyprus University of Technology depicting Ktisis, the spirit of creation.
name: Ktisis Cyprus University of Technology

description: Digital Research Infrastructure for the Language Technologies, Arts and Humanities supported by
name: LINDAT/CLARIAH-CZ

description: DepositOnce is TU Berlin’s institutional repository and is operated and continually developed by the Service Center for Research Data and Publications.
name: DepositOnce
Fordatis - Research Data Repository of Fraunhofer-Gesellschaft

description: OPARA is the Open Access Repository and Archive for Research Data of Saxon Universities.
name: OpARA - Open Access Repository and Archive Saxon Universities

description: Library Open Access Repository
name: LOAR

description: CLARIN-DK is an infrastructure where researchers can deposit, share and download language-based material. i.e. texts, transcriptions, lexicons, word lists, audio and video files. CLARIN-DK also comprises interactive language tools.
name: CLARIN-DK-UCPH Repository

description: DataDOI is an open access repository for publishing research data
name: DataDOI

description: Estonian University of Life Sciences
name: EMU DSpace

description: The mission of QSAR DataBank (QsarDB) is to provide a platform for organization and long term preservation of QSAR data and models.
name: QSAR DataBank (QsarDB)
Repositorio Institucional de la Universidad de Burgos

description: The Universitat de Barcelona Digital Repository is an institutional resource containing open-access digital versions of publications related to the teaching, research and institutional activities of the UB teaching staff and other members of the university community.
name: The Universitat de Barcelona Digital Repository

description: DUGiDocs is the institutional repository of the Universitat de Girona. Its aim is to preserve, spread and make visible the intellectual production issued from research and teaching lead at the UdG, such as degree final reports, master reports and doctorate research reports by university students as well as articles in scientific periodicals. Moreover it includes indexing and content description tools, makes visualization from many other internet sites easier (interoperability) and it also includes open access.
name: dugi-doc.udg.edu

description: JYX contains digital materials of University of Jyväskylä from master's and licentiate theses to dissertations and from digitized journals to originally electronic materials. The majority of the collection is openly available. There may, however, be also some restricted items as well.
name: JYX Digital Repository
DataSTORRE. Stirling Online Repository for Research Data.

description: Research Data Unipd is a research data archive. The service aims to facilitate data discovery, data sharing, and reuse as required by funding institutions (e.g. European Commission).
name: Research Data Unipd

description: AUB ScholarWorks is a digital service that collects, preserves, and distributes digital material. Repositories are important tools for preserving an organization's legacy; they facilitate digital preservation and scholarly communication.
name: AUB Scholarworks

description: Welcome to the Qatar Univeristy Digital Hub Portal, where we provide you digital access to Qatar University's original research, scholarly works, adminstrative and archive of historical materials.
name: Qatar University Digital Hub

description: CHERRY, ie CHEmistry RepositoRY is a joint digital repository of the all departments in University of Belgrade - Faculty of Chemistry. CHERRY provides open access to the publications, as well as to other outputs of the research projects implemented in this institution.
name: Cherry Repository

description: Bilkent University Institutional Repository (BUIR), a service of Bilkent University Libraries, collects, preserves, and distributes the intellectual output of Bilkent University. Faculty, staff, and students are invited to deposit their research and scholarship. Departments, administrative units, programs, and centers are invited to use the Institutional Repository to distribute their working papers, technical reports, conference proceedings, and other research material. For assistance in depositing documents. For more information, please contact us.
name: Bilkent University Institutional Repository (BUIR)
Data Repository for U of M

description: DataSpace is a digital repository meant for both archiving and publicly disseminating digital data which are the result of research, academic, or administrative work performed by members of the Princeton University community. DataSpace will promote awareness of the data and address concerns for ensuring the long-term availability of data in the repository.
name: DataSpace at Princeton University

description: ResearchWorks Archive is the University of Washington digital repository (also known as institutional repository) for disseminating scholarly work.
name: ResearchWorks at the University of Washington

description: The Digital Repository at the University of Maryland (DRUM) collects, preserves, and provides public access to the scholarly output of the university. Faculty and researchers can upload research products for rapid dissemination, global visibility and impact, and long-term preservation.
name: The Digital Repository at the University of Maryland (DRUM)

description: KU ScholarWorks is the digital repository of the University of Kansas.
name: KU ScholarWorks

description: Mountain Scholar is an open access repository service that collects, preserves, and provides access to digitized library collections and other scholarly and creative works from Colorado State University and the University Press of Colorado. It also serves as a dark archive for the Open Textbook Library.
name: Mountain Scholar

description: Indiana University's Institutional Repository
name: IUScholarWorks

description: IUPUI ScholarWorks is the institutional repository established to collect and disseminate works by the campus community.
name: IUPUI ScholarWorks

description: ScholarWorks is an open access repository for the capture of the intellectual work of Montana State University (MSU) in support of its teaching, research and service missions.
name: ScholarWorks MSU

description: ScholarWorks is University of Alaska's institutional repository created to preserve and share our electronic research and institutional materials. In ScholarWorks you'll discover a growing number of papers, publications, archival collections, dissertations, theses, and more!.
name: ScholarWorks MSU

description: A Repository of Agricultural Research Outputs
name: CGSpace
